articles.author: ET Bureau
articles.title: Most analysts bullish on RIL
articles.description: Brokerages have largely retained a bullish view on Reliance Industries (RIL) after its March quarter earnings citing its telecom and new energy business as growth drivers. RIL posted a 22.5% year-on-year rise in consolidated net profit at ₹16,203 crore.
